website_summaries.verdict: An easy to use goose call that fits the budget.
pros: Does not require much air to produce sound
Nice sound that is decently loud
A good product for the money
cons: Does not come with an instructional video

customer_reviews.title: Sounds amazing from 100 yards away
customer_reviews.text: This goose call does not sound too great when you're the blower or you're right next to the blower, but from about 100 yards away, it sounds AMAZING. I had a buddy blow this from across a lake and I could not tell the difference between this call and a live goose. That day we were able to easily call in 4 flocks and bag a few Canadas.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Caruso

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Lost end piece easily
customer_reviews.text: I can bring in most lol flying geese and get higher flying ones to circle back and decreased altitude. However the bendable end is detachable and is very easy to lose
customer_reviews.author: cruzwie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome call
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to blow and turns right over on the "who-it". Takes hardly any air to use and very easy to produce the sounds you're looking for. Would highly recommend this call for anyone from veteran to beginner.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Skip this one. Not a good sounder
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had other flutes, double, and single reed goose calls that I’ve had good luck with. I had a heck of a time getting this call to break from low to high. I didn’t like the sound that came out once I did figure it out. I’m going back to my double reed and other flute I have.
customer_reviews.author: M.R.

customer_reviews.title: Great call
customer_reviews.text: Great call. Used it on opening day of early goose season here in New York. It drew the birds right in to field decoys set on a field that had been bush-hogged four days prior (not an agricultural field). Not an area to which the resident birds were habituated. The moan really brought them in feet down, wings spread for the shot.
customer_reviews.author: KAM

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and sound good on
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my boy right away he could call good on it. Great price should last just about for ever has good tone to it too.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin wags kane

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use Sounds Great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to Use, sounds great, decent price compared to others I have seen
customer_reviews.author: Jim H.

customer_reviews.title: Was looking for a good "closer"
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping this would help me with the finishing clucks as birds are set to land, but it's a little too loud for that, and I'm used to short-reed calls now so it was tough to control.
customer_reviews.author: superbeau

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this as a replacement of my 5 year old one! Still as good as it’s always been
customer_reviews.author: PAT

customer_reviews.title: Great Goode call! Sounds exactly like the BIG honkers that we get around here!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great honker call! I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a goose call. This product is great. If you happen to make the inside wet, it is very easy to disassemble to clean and reassemble it. You can truly trust this flute. I'll be editing this review after I use it on geese this fall.
customer_reviews.author: MosesJackson

customer_reviews.title: Works great, I use three calls when I'm hunting and ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great, I use three calls when I'm hunting and this one brings them in for the final locked wing landing. Got my limit every time I go out. Way easier to use than the expensive ones
customer_reviews.author: Chrispyone

customer_reviews.title: Great Call
customer_reviews.text: This is a super nice call, didn't break the bank either. Loud and relatively simply to use good job!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Buy something else
customer_reviews.text: Not the greatest sound really high pitched and needs alot of air
customer_reviews.author: nbroome66

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Works great. The online video helped to teach us how to use it so it was even better than I hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great starting call
customer_reviews.text: High quality call at an affordable price. I was able to turn flocks and get them to land. Comes with great instructions on how to start practicing your calls.
customer_reviews.author: A. Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy from OaBLiquidators
customer_reviews.text: Bought new from OaBLiquidators and product was used and opened. After sanitizing the call works as intended. Buy from another seller.
customer_reviews.author: hunter

customer_reviews.title: ... that I have found and I think it sounds pretty good, the geese seem to agree with me
customer_reviews.text: This is the easiest call to use that I have found and I think it sounds pretty good, the geese seem to agree with me. Also its very cheap
customer_reviews.author: Cobin C.

customer_reviews.title: Land Em In Your Spread
customer_reviews.text: This sucker works and doesn't break the bank like higher-end calls. It's easy to use and master. Comes with a free string lanyard too.
customer_reviews.author: Abishai

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipment
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for radio show host DB Wagner on 89.1 KRFC COLORADO. He enjoyed the true sound for his skit.
customer_reviews.author: Thora Wagner

customer_reviews.title: I’ll pass
customer_reviews.text: Might be alright for a beginner. Not to happy about the overall experience of mine.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Good price/quality.
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my son and he says it works better than his old call, which had fallen apart.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Bryant

customer_reviews.title: As expected. Decent sound for a cheap flute. ...
customer_reviews.text: As expected. Decent sound for a cheap flute. I'm not an expert caller but can make this thing sound half way decent. Will see what the geese think I'm a couple weeks. Shipping was faster than expected even with the standard free shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Primos Canada Goose Flute Call
customer_reviews.text: This is so handy and a def. must have! I never imagined that this would be so wonderful! I'm so glad that I got it and I would recommend it to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Wells

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for beginners and better for pros
customer_reviews.text: Great value! Anyone can pick this up and call in a goose. Keep the instructions they help a lot
customer_reviews.author: dylan ruby

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done, easy to use, but not super loud
customer_reviews.text: Works well, and takes basically no skill to operate and call in geese with. Is not as loud as a short reed goose call, but gets the job done. On the first day I used this I had a guy hunting with me tell me that these don't work at all where he hunts, and then saw him in shock when geese started turning in when I honked on this. Seems to matter more whether or not it's something the geese have been hearing a lot of or not. This call gets the job done, is very easy to use, but is not super loud and you can't make tons of different sounds with it.
customer_reviews.author: Lamarsh

customer_reviews.title: Sounds good to me
customer_reviews.text: got this in the off season. Sounds good to me, but I'm not a goose!...;)
customer_reviews.author: Reddawg

customer_reviews.title: great did what it should of
customer_reviews.text: Price to please, great did what it should of ,sounds great.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony C

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works fine not a high dollar model but does the job
customer_reviews.author: Judy Davis

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it
customer_reviews.text: I Love this goose call! It arrived quickly. I have had several comments on it! I would recommend it to anybody out there!
customer_reviews.author: tracy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: good buy cant wait till september to try it out
customer_reviews.author: joshua watkins

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It got my old dog interested, hopefully the geese will be also.
customer_reviews.author: stew

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It sounds good. I have not tried it in the field yet.
customer_reviews.author: Alex G.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great. Very loud. Now it's time to decoy some geese in
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: One of the better calls that I have bought, has an excellent tone.
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great seller. Item was as described. Would recommend this seller to others. Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Great Call
customer_reviews.text: Sounds GREAT! Easy to learn goose calls with this call, easy to blow.
customer_reviews.author: J. Main

customer_reviews.title: easy to master!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to replicate canadian geese with this, if you mess around and don't follow the directions that came with it! I live on a flyway and hear them big honkers going over all the time, and I never blew a call in my life, but with this cheap call I can copy them exactly!
customer_reviews.author: moxie mainer

customer_reviews.title: Primos Goose Call
customer_reviews.text: Goose call is very easy to use. Easy to blow, Easy to manipulate different calls and tones. Great product. Reccommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Realtor

customer_reviews.title: Accurate goose sound and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very nice goose call....even my small children can use it. Our local geese are impressed. I would recommend this to the average person needing a goose call.
customer_reviews.author: B.

customer_reviews.title: Best Goose Call < $50
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite goose call. EXTREMELY easy to use and sound like a goose. Used it the day after I got it to call in a group of 3 geese and limited out!
customer_reviews.author: BJH888

customer_reviews.title: Great for calling geese to your neighbors pond so they ...
customer_reviews.text: Great for calling geese to your neighbors pond so they don't land in yours. Takes a few hours to get perfect but once there you can call geese in from anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Kit Hinkle

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Terrible call. I gave it to my friends kid to play with, waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Kacy Sisco

customer_reviews.title: goose goose
customer_reviews.text: the prios goose call works very well,it will get the canada goose to talk to you any time of the day, I dont shoot just talk
customer_reviews.author: garryhonda

customer_reviews.title: Beware opened packaging!
customer_reviews.text: This was meant to be a present for my son, but it was opened when received. I'm sure not going to give my son something to blow into that someone else has had their lips on, so it went back. That would have been fine, but Amazon charged me for the return shipping. Not satisfied with this transaction at all!
customer_reviews.author: 85Gator

customer_reviews.title: Get it while its on sale!!!
customer_reviews.text: Easiest call to use, sounds better than my other goose call.
customer_reviews.author: Fritz Jimmie

product_meta.title: Primos Canada Goose Flute Call
product_meta.description: An easy to use flute. Back pressure is controlled automatically with FLEX-end hose. Reproduces the loud, mellow tones of the Canada goose. Features a precise "Reed Relocation" system. Includes lanyard.
feature_bullets: Crafted from the highest quality material ensuring quality and durability
Made in the U. S. A.
Perfect for the goose hunter unfamiliar with flute-styled calls
Reproduces the loud tones of the great Canada goose
Unique flex-end hose creates automatic back pressure making it the easiest flute to blow
Patented Reed System allows you to take the call apart and reassemble with perfect retuning every time

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
